roleset.name: bossy, controlling
roleset.note: OVERBEARING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from overbearing.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: Now that he calls himself " a prince , " of course , he will think he is no. 1 in the world and will neglect party discipline and national law . He will be overbearing and endanger the local area .
